name: Forky's Forking Job
description:
You are Forky the forklift!

Transport as much cargo as possible to the Deliver Area in your limited time, but with flimsy vases and chaotically stacked pallets that easier said than done.

Originally Created at Nordic Game Jam 2022 by:

Painting Pixels & Pretty Props: Kristian Knudsen
Speedy Scripting & Stealing Sounds: Benjamin Ma

with our theme being "Transportation".

Controls:
Keyboard: 
Drive + Steer: WASD
Lift: Up and Down Arrow

XBox Controller:
Drive: Triggers
Steer: Left Analog
Lift: Right Analog

Voice of Forky: Marie Ma
Music: The Show Must Be Go by Kevin Macleod (filmmusic.io)
